narrative.future_earnings_profile: Demand certainty: Low. Capacity reality: Episodically constrained. Earnings posture: "Emerging / Watch". The business demonstrates early demand momentum with moderate stability and meaningful volatility. Capacity is sufficient on average but becomes constrained during peak periods. High delivery reliability indicates strong execution, while volatility and peak constraints limit near-term earnings readiness.
narrative.base_case_summary: If current conditions persist, the business is likely to experience fluctuating order volumes due to demand volatility. While delivery reliability remains strong, episodic capacity saturation during peak periods may constrain fulfillment and earnings scalability.
upside_conditions: Improved demand stability and repeat behavior.
Increased preorder coverage smoothing demand peaks.
downside_risks: Tighter capacity constraints during peak periods.
Adverse changes in top customer behavior.
key_assumptions: Observed demand patterns remain directionally consistent.
Delivery reliability remains strong under current volumes.
Capacity constraints remain episodic rather than continuous.
what_would_change_this_outcome: Material improvement in demand stability and repeat strength.
Targeted expansion or optimization of peak-period capacity.

scenarios.description: The base case reflects stable but uneven earnings due to fluctuating demand and peak-period capacity saturation. Execution quality remains strong, but scalability is limited.

primary_drivers: Better alignment of capacity with peak demand
scenarios.description: The upside scenario emerges if demand becomes more predictable and capacity constraints are mitigated, allowing earnings to scale more reliably.
